name: Enhanced Strength
description: Mutation causes increased muscle density and power.
drawbacks: Increased caloric requirements (need to eat 50% more)
May appear visibly muscular or deformed

name: Armored Skin
description: Skin develops tough, armored plates or scales.
effects: Natural armor: +10 to all body locations
Resistance to cutting and piercing damage
Damage reduction: 2 points from all physical attacks
drawbacks: -5 to DEX due to reduced flexibility
Cannot wear some types of armor

name: Psionic Sensitivity
effects: Access to one additional psionic power
drawbacks: Vulnerable to psionic attacks (-5 to defense)
May experience random psionic phenomena when stressed

name: Regeneration
description: Body can rapidly repair injuries and regrow tissue.
drawbacks: Pain sensitivity increased (+25% damage from pain-based attacks)

name: Toxic Blood
effects: When injured, attackers in melee range must make VIT check or take 1d6 poison damage
Immunity to most poisons and toxins
drawbacks: Risk of self-poisoning when severely injured
Cannot donate blood or receive transfusions

name: Photosynthetic Skin
description: Skin contains chlorophyll-like compounds that convert light to energy.
effects: Can go without food for weeks if exposed to sunlight
Minor healing (1 HP per hour) in sunlight
drawbacks: Weakness in prolonged darkness (-5 to all attributes after 3+ days)

name: Vestigial Wings
description: Partially developed wings sprouting from back.
effects: Gliding capability (can safely fall from any height if conscious)
Can eventually develop into functional wings with further mutation

name: Radiation Absorption
description: Body processes radiation as energy instead of taking damage.
effects: Convert radiation exposure to temporary HP (1 per rad, up to 20)
drawbacks: Glows faintly in darkness after exposure
May become dependent on radiation for full health

name: Degenerated Physique
description: Body has become weakened and frail due to mutation.
effects: Vulnerability to disease and poison (+50% effect)

name: Mental Instability
description: Brain chemistry altered causing psychological issues.
effects: Random mood swings and personality shifts
Must make PSY check in stressful situations or suffer temporary breakdown
drawbacks: May develop more severe conditions with time
